name: KriskoDisko13
text: Always a favorite since college, this local franchise has some of the best pizza around. They offer a lot of delivery options, though I dont fall within their delivery range despite being pretty close. The employees told me I could speak to â€¦More

name: Aaron Lunsford
text: Got their heart-shaped pizza for Valentine's day and it was great (feat. Dairy Queen ice cream cake).

name: Sanjaya Sapkota
text: They have such a awesome service. I ordered crispy cheese pizza with 3 topping that was such an amazing. Well done. Good job.

name: Amanda Santiago
text: Meghan brings such a bright, positive, and fun atmosphere to this location, food was so good, hot, fresh and cooked to literal perfection. Thanks for the great experience!

name: arianah
text: The nicest staff clean eatery area and best cheapest gluten free pizza anywhere..and the garlic herb crust..ommmagaawd!!

name: Jeree Smith
text: No one is perfect but my staff is amazing and so are our customers. Thank you all for the good reviews and the bad, just shows us that improving never stops!!

name: crystal Williams
text: This review is getting a 2 because of the service not the food, lets be clear. The pizza was and is always amazing. However, not being greeted, not being thanked. Not being spoken to during the transaction. I have never experienced such poor customer service from a staff member at any HH. I was disappointed to say the least.

name: LaVonda Fowler
text: You honestly can't go wrong with a Hungry Howies sub! Try all the flavors on the crust!

name: E Bunny
text: No one washed their hands. I literally watched a boy take his hat off and rub his head then continued to handle food. They were eating while making the food it was disgusting.

name: Daniel Judy
text: The staff was amazing and the food was great!! Iâ€™ll be back soon.thank you all

name: Kayla Peterson
text: This is my family's favorite place to go for pizza. It's not sopping in grease like other pizza places. It's flavorful as well, especially if you get the cajun or butter crusts. It's also super affordable and doesn't taste like reheated â€¦More

name: Sabrina Low
text: Love this place.  If there are any issues they are quick to fix.  Will be ordering again from them.

name: Nick Sprague
text: Great pizza place. The flavored crust makes their pizzas standout and you can always get a good deal with their online coupons.  Highly recommend to anyone who has not tried them before.

name: S M
text: Fast, friendly service. Great prices. Howie bread is my favorite but everything I've ordered here has been excellent!

name: Dawn Dawn
text: Prices are reasonable. Their lunch specials are what I mainly get, they are decent in size and value. You get free flavor crusts if you choose to add it to your pizza. I also enjoy their 3 cheeser Howie bread. The reason I didn't give a 5 star rating is the fact that on more than one occasion I was given the wrong order.

name: Lisa Z
text: Fresh ingredients.  On a Saturday nite, we did have to wait 1.5 hours for delivery.. No problem pizza was delivered hot. Driver was nice and polite. Same with person who took call. ..  Very affordable pizza I've ordered here before . â€¦More

name: Marie White
text: Love Hungry Howies. Our first time actually eating there as we usually have it delivered. We'll be back!

name: Kathleen Koechling
text: Really like the butter crust pizza,  especially for $5 for the small, 2 topping. Each person can have their own, with leftovers. Better than average gluten free pizza crust for several dollars more.

name: jennifer Martinez
text: Stood in the store and waited for service for 10 minutes. It appeared only 1person was working, he was making pizza, but turned out they had multiple employees in the back. Did not give me items I paid for.  Employees didn't seem to care or do anything to fix it.

name: Nora Edwards
text: The crust is the thing. And they will season it for you. Good eating. Good price.

name: Tricia Serino
text:
Fresh and fast! Great deal and coupons, very fast delivery or pick-up from store. Close to where I live, and my neighbors also enjoy.
Friendly staff,  pizza dough is made fresh daily which stands out. Has decent Gluten-free SM pizza, and exceptionally good vegetarian options.

name: Scott Forbes
text: Most of the time it is okay but only a couple of occasions when I've ordered my pizza well done I actually got it burnt to a crisp. Well done does not mean burnt

name: Francisco Peot
text: Hungry Howieâ€™s is great!  We are from Virginia and ordered from here while we were in town.  The Asiago crust is delicious.  The owner must have worked for Pizza Hut. Similar crust toppings.  The pizza is much better here.  The wings are delicious!

name: Colin Glenn
text: Tall guy wearing a hat took my order, he also rang me out. He got my order wrong then blamed me that I ordered cheese. I actually ordered pepperoni. He stated Good job telling a customer there wrong buddy. Wonâ€™t go back again.

name: Zack Helms
text: Consistently decent quality pizza that the kids love.

name: The AlterNatives
text: Employees and manager are awesome at this location.

name: brad lineberger
text: Very good, fresh, great price

name: Missy Simmons
text: The best pizza hands down...

name: Monica Lee
text: The cashier wore no gloves while making the pizza after ringing us up. Do you realized the germs passed through finger nails and skin.That's nasty....we were told that they are NOT required to wear gloves. Won't be going back there...

name: Ty Peacock
text: My husband love it but not my favorite. The pizza don't have much taste to it to me.

name: Dorchelle Lunsford
text: The manager was very helpful i was able to get in an out

name: B Leigh
text:
Ate here for the first time tonight.

I ordered two large pizzas with garlic herb crust for the family. Only good â€¦More

name: Dan Hopkins
text: Pizza tastes like Little Caesars except much more expensive,  oh and with flavored crust.  A bunch of 5 star reviews with no comments,  smells fishy to me.  Pizza was sub-par at best. If you want mediocre mass produced pizza go to Little â€¦More

name: Anna Avery
text: Quick bite is ok, not the greatest pizza

name: maeow
text: We love their pizzas and wings!

name: image capture
text: So it's now pizza flat, folded or rolled appearantly. Am deeply saddened that the menu has changed and any bread type option is made with pizza dough. â€¦More

name: Brian Mackey
text: Good food

name: Derek Carey
text: Best pizza crust ever made!!!!

name: Yoli J.
text: First time there because my kids had a free certificate and they all received personal pan pizzas and I purchased a meatball sub and it was  so delicious.  I enjoyed the pizza as well!

name: Doris J
text: Great pizza and price. Ordered the brownie also. It was cold and was somewhat like a chocolate bar. But I enjoyed it as well!.

name: sherry branch
text: I should Have ordered Pizza.....I have never tried it either but it has to be better than this pizza/sandwich  with the huge pieces of just green leafy lettuce in the middle.  they take a pizza crust and cut it in half  and make a sandwich â€¦More

name: Jon Potter
text: My favorite budget pizza. It's tasty, fast and a good price.

name: Elizabeth Hinson
text:
Dear Hungry Howies,
Your pizza arrived 2 minutes ago piping hot! Yesss! You guys have some of the best pizza around and your customer service has always been on point! Thank you so â€¦More

name: Karl Fisher
text: I enjoyed my first visit.   Calzones were very good.  Hot and fresh.  The cold lettuce and tomatoes in the hot calzone make for a great contrast and is very good.  Staff was friendly and helpful, restaurant is clean.  It is a little hard to â€¦More

name: David O
text: Calzones are amazing. Quick delivery time. Not a fan of all the different crust flavors for the pizza but that's just my personal preference, the standard crust is okay.

name: Travis Horton
text: Pretty good but pricey. Look for coupons.

name: Margarett Kingsbury
text: Staff is very outgoing and friendly.

name: Adam Brown
text:
-Tastes bad due to corn meal all over the bottom
-Crust not flavored as it is supposed to be
-Slow â€¦More

name: Shannon Benedetto
text: The hungry howies staff is always friendly and efficient

name: Pramod Pawar
text: Hungry howies is always one my favorites. Their garlic crust is best.

name: Christina Meeker
text: We've ordered a few times and the pizza is aways very good.  Not at all impressed though by the sides. The boneless wings tasted strange.  The howie brownie is terribly dry and freezing cold, like it was just defrosted.   Disappointing if you want to order more than just pizza!

name: Don Don F
text: It took a couple minutes for someone to come to the front and take my order, but other than that service was fast and food was good as usual.

name: Richard
text: Their pizzas are really good, and the usually have coupons to make them an even better deal. I didn't care much for their brownies, though.

name: Ben B
text: Pizza is decent and prices are very reasonable if you wait until you get coupons. Never had any issues ordering here.

name: Shon
text: Great Cheesy bread.

name: Erik Aagaard
text: Awesome pizza!  Delivery is always fast and hot. The flavored crust is delicious - my favorites are the asiago or cajun crusts. 3 cheeser breadsticks are a must!

name: Tara Kathleen Mary Dahlin
text: Been a few times to pickup, always had my order right, ready on time, and were prompt and friendly in store. It's good cheap pizza.

name: Gordon Fayette
text: Great drink good food friendly services

name: Christian Terry
text: Great Pizza. Horrible employees.

name: Brandon Shufelt
text: The best pizza!

name: Justin
text: Way better than little Cesar's!! Worth the ðŸ’°

name: Ralph D57
text: Ordered 100 pizzas and they were all EXCELLENT!!

name: Jess Vaughn's Jewels
text: Love their flavor!

name: Zack Ferris
text: Love this place, you can't beat the price and the calzones are awesome. The pizza is okay not great but for the price you can't beat it.

name: S Dot
text: Underrated

name: Sabrina Addison
text: Pizza was good but the crust was hard!

name: Stephanie Matott
text: It's an overpriced Little Caesar's
